summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QA Task Manager bug fixes - Iteration 5. All 3 critical bug fixes verified working: Admin Panel user list loading, Report export (PDF/Excel/Word), and SERCANO user login with admin role. Backend 100% pass rate (17/17 tests). Frontend fully functional.

backend: Health check endpoint - SQLite database healthy
SERCANO user registration gets admin role
Regular user registration gets user role
/users/roles with admin_user_id returns user list with roles
/users/roles with non-admin user returns 403 (Admin yetki gerekli)
PDF export returns 200 with valid content
Excel export returns 200 with valid content
Word export returns 200 with valid content
Dashboard stats returns valid data structure
Get all users for task assignment
frontend: Login page loads with Turkish UI (Başlayalım, Giriş Yap)
SERCANO user registration successful with admin role
Admin Panel accessible for admin users
Admin Panel shows user list with 20 users
Admin Panel shows user roles (Admin/User badges)
Admin Panel shows email, registration date columns
Reports page loads with statistics cards
Export dropdown shows PDF, Excel, Word options

critical_code_review_comments: Route ordering fix verified - /users/roles now correctly defined before /users/{user_id}
ReportExportRequest Pydantic model correctly accepts request body
Admin authorization check working correctly (403 for non-admin users)
All export formats (PDF, Excel, Word) generating valid files
seed_data_creation: Test users created with unique device_ids for each test scenario
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bug fixes verified working: 1) Admin Panel /users/roles endpoint with admin_user_id parameter returns user list, 2) Report export /reports/export endpoint works for PDF/Excel/Word formats with Pydantic model, 3) SERCANO user gets admin role on registration. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_bug_fixes.py can be reused for regression testing.

admin_panel_user_list.details: GET /api/users/roles?admin_user_id={id} returns user list with id, name, email, role, created_at. Non-admin users get 403 error.

report_export.details: POST /api/reports/export with ReportExportRequest body (format, user_id, include_tasks, include_stats) returns valid PDF/Excel/Word files.

sercano_admin_login.details: User with name 'sercano' (case-insensitive) gets admin role on registration. Admin Panel accessible.

dashboard_display.details: Dashboard loads correctly after login with greeting, statistics, and notification.

mocked_apis.jira_integration: MOCKED - VPN access not available for testing
